name: Windmill Dweller
description:
This game is the capstone project of my studies.  It is still in development until the end of the month. I wanted to share the early version with you. 

Windmill Dweller is a  3D isometric game with optic illusions, where the player encounters examples of impossible geometry. 

Owl asset is from the Quirky Series - Animals Mega Pack Vol.1: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/quirky-series-animal...

All other 3D models have been created by me in Blender.

Music is royalty free. Copyright/Attribution Notice: Her Violet Eyes by tgfcoder licensed under CC-BY-3,  Snowy Cozyness (Calm Piano/Guitar) by Christian DeTamble, Ambient Music by Mayra : https://mayragandra.itch.io/freeambientmusic .
